## first ideas

-   dominant land use
-   Urban pressure
-   Agricultural pressure
-   Confinement
-   Stream Power Index

## Dominant land use

land use category with highest share of valley bottom area.

-   urban areas + infrastructure

-   agricultural land

-   natural land (forest & grassland)

## Confinement

proposed confinement index from 0-1 divided into 4 classes:

-   strongly confined
-   confined
-   weakly confined
-   unconfined
